messages: Life lesson from the Titanic: " In a disaster, everyone is equal."
Life lesson from the Titanic: " In a disaster, everyone is equal."
PufferFish are not good at swimming, but they have a natural defense skill. One Pufferfish contains enough poison to kill 30 people.
